item.description: A two-part Chakra Class offered through Beverly Recreation Department's Health and Well Being series. In it, we'll discuss the attributes of each of these seven major centers of the human energy field, and their significance in our physical, mental, and spiritual well-being. We'll also share exercises that you can use on your own to 'buff up' and vitalize your own chakras. For more info and to register, go to http://www.bevrec.com/programs/health.html.  We hope to see you there!

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Chakra Workshop with Mia & Barb
